meanings: if the worst comes (to the worst)

examples.korean: to make contingency plans 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만일의 사태에 대비한 계획을 세우다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to make contingency plans Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We were prepared for every eventuality. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 모든 만일의 사태에 대비하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were prepared for every eventuality. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We must consider all possible contingencies. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 모든 가능한 만일의 사태를 고려해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We must consider all possible contingencies. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The money had been saved for just such an eventuality. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 돈은 그냥 그와 같은 만일의 사태에 대비해서 모아 둔 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The money had been saved for just such an eventuality. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If we did not have one, then I would create one. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만일 경쟁력이 없다면 만들어야겠죠. DARAKWON
examples.english: If we did not have one, then I would create one. Add to Wordbook
